    • Method Detail

      • create

        public static Whorlwind create(android.content.Context context,
                               Storage storage,

      • canStoreSecurely

        public abstract boolean canStoreSecurely()
        Returns true if the device is currently capable of reading/writing from/to secure storage.

        Note: This method must be checked before calling write(String, ByteString) or read(String).

      • write

        public abstract void write(java.lang.String name,
                           ByteString value)
        Writes a value to secure storage.

      • read

        public abstract <any> read(java.lang.String name)
        Reads a value from secure storage. If no value is found, a result with a state of READY and a null value will be emitted. Otherwise, a result with a state of NEEDS_AUTH will be emitted and the fingerprint reader will be activated. Future events from the fingerprint reader will be emitted to the stream.
